welcome: Finden Sie einen Workshop in Ihrer Nähe
banner: Find a Fresk will soon be internationalized! In the meantime, visit the project page, and follow us on LinkedIn!
footer: Find a Fresk ist kein offizielles Tool, ist NICHT vollständig und ersetzt nicht die manuelle Suche, inbesondere wenn keine verfügbaren Worshops auf unserer Website aufgeführt sind.

results.missingWorkshop: Ihre Workshop wird nicht angezeigt? Schauen Sie die Anleitungen auf der Startseite nach!

qa.title: Was ist Find a Fresk?
qa.description: Find a Fresk ist eine Suchmachine, die Workshops auflistet, die Climate Fresk ähneln.

interest.title: Welchen Zweck erfüllt Find a Fresk?
interest.description: Find a Fresk ist eine Platform, die es Ihnen ermöglicht, Workshops mit einem nachhaltigen und sozialen Thema in Ihre Nähe zu finden. Zu den derzeit aufgeführten Workshops gehören: Fresque du Climat, Atelier 2tonnes, Fresque de la Diversité, Fresque Océane, Fresque de la Construction, Fresque Agri'Alim, Fresque des Nouveaux Récits, Fresque de la Mobilité, Fresque de l'Alimentation, Atelier Inventons Nos Vies Bas Carbone, Atelier OGRE, Fresque de l'Eau, Fresque de l'Économie Circulaire, Ateliers Futurs Proches, Fresque du Textile, Fresque des Déchets, Fresque des Frontières Planétaires, Atelier Horizons Décarbonés, Atelier 2030 Glorieuses, Fresque de la Biodiversité, Fresque du Sexisme, Fresque du Numérique, Puzzle Climat, Fresque de la Finance, Fresque de la RSE, Cyber Fresque, Fresque du Plastique, Fresque du Bénévolat. Reservierungen werden über die entsprechenden Ticketplattformen vorgenommen. Wir sind mit keiner diese Strukturen verbunden.

functionality.title: Wie funktioniert Find a Fresk?
functionality.description: Die Algorithmen von Find a Fresk sammeln Workshop-Veranstaltungen von verschiedenen Reservierungsplattformen (z.B. Billetweb.fr, Eventbrite.fr, Fresqueduclimat.org, usw), um die Suche zu vereinfachen. Die Liste der Workshops auf unserer Plattform is NICHT vollständig.

non_profit.title: Ist Find a Fresk eine gemeinnützige Organisation?
non_profit.description: Tatsächlich. Die Plattform ist kostenlos, werbefrei und erfordert keine Registrierung. Wir halten uns an die DSGVO, indem wir keine personenbezogenen Daten speichern, und an die europäische Cookie-Richtlinie, indem wir keine Cookies speichern. Der Quellcode ist frei verfügbar.

support.title: Wie kann ich die Entwicklung der Plattform unterstützen?
support.description: Die Entwicklung von Open-Source-Software kostet Zeit und Geld, nicht nur für die anfängliche Arbeit aber auch für die laufende Wartung. Wenn Sie die Entwicklung dieser Plattform unterstützen möchten, dürfen sie gerne über Liberapay einen finanziellen Beitrag leisten (die Zahlung erfolgt über Paypal). Sie dürfen auch gerne unsere Plattform in den sozialen Medien teilen. Vielen Dank!

help.title: Hilfe! Ich habe eine Workshop-Veranstaltung veröffentlicht, die nicht auf Find a Fresk angezeigt wird!
help.description: Ihre Veranstaltung erfüllt nicht alle Bedingungen für eine automatische Übernahme. Bitte andern Sie sie auf der ursprüngliche Reservierungsplattform, nachdem Sie unseren Leitfaden für Workshop-Organisatoren gelesen haben.

edition.title: Edition
edition.content: This site is edited by Thomas Bouvier and Timothé Frignac and hosted by Hostinger, headquartered at HOSTINGER INTERNATIONAL LTD, 61 Lordou Vironos Street, 6023 Larnaca, Cyprus, contactable via: https://www.hostinger.fr/contact.

personal_data.title: Personal Data
personal_data.content: Your IP address and the page reference you visited are part of the personal information stored on the server hosting this site. This data may be used to diagnose issues but will never be shared with third parties and is automatically deleted. For any questions regarding your personal data, you can contact us at: contact@trouverunefresque.org.

FresqueNouveauxRecits.name: New Narratives Collage
FresqueNouveauxRecits.description: Promote a different society through a collaborative and engaging workshop

FresqueOceane.name: Ocean Collage
FresqueOceane.description: Discover the challenges related to the ocean and how we can all act to preserve it

FresqueBiodiversite.name: Biodiversity Collage
FresqueBiodiversite.description: Discover the systemic aspect of biodiversity erosion: what it is, what it allows, and what degrades it

FresqueAgriAlim.name: Agri'Food Collage

FresqueMobilite.name: Mobility Fresk
FresqueMobilite.description: Discover how to adopt a more sustainable mobility individually and collectively

FresqueAlimentation.name: Food Fresk
FresqueAlimentation.description: Discover the environmental, health, and social issues related to your diet

OGRE.name: OGRE
OGRE.description: Understand the challenges of the energy transition

FresqueConstruction.name: Construction Collage
FresqueConstruction.description: Raise awareness of the impacts of construction as a team to act effectively

FresqueSexisme.name: Sexism Fresk
FresqueSexisme.description: Dismantle sexist mechanisms and project yourself into an egalitarian society

AtelierInventonsNosViesBasCarbone.name: Designing our Sustainable Lives

FresqueDeLeau.name: Water Fresk
FresqueDeLeau.description: Understand the keys to understanding water, its origin, its use, and the evolution of this resource

FutursProches.name: Near Futures
FutursProches.description: Imagine together desirable, plural, alternative, and sustainable futures

FresqueDiversite.name: Diversity Fresk
FresqueDiversite.description: 41 cards to foster more inclusive awareness

FresqueDuTextile.name: Textiles Untangled
FresqueDuTextile.description: Discover the ins and outs of the textile industry, its impacts, and alternatives for sustainable fashion

FresqueDesDechets.name: Waste Fresk
FresqueDesDechets.description: Discover the complexity of waste treatment, what happens to it, and its impact on the environment

PuzzleClimat.description: A workshop to halve your carbon footprint in 5 years without going back to the oil lamp!

FresqueFinance.description: Raise awareness of the role of finance in the socio-ecological transition and encourage citizens to think about levers of action

FresqueRSE.description: Contribute to a positive, ethical, and sustainable company and become an actor of change yourself

2tonnes.name: 2tonnes Workshop
2tonnes.description: Explore the future as a team and try to limit climate change

AtelierCompteGouttes.name: Drip Workshop
AtelierCompteGouttes.description: Explore the impact of climate change on water

FresqueBenevolat.name: Volunteering Fresk

FresquePlastique.name: Plastic Collage
FresquePlastique.description: Take a look at the entire life cycle of plastics

FresqueClimat.name: Climate Fresk
FresqueClimat.description: Do you want to act for the climate but don't have the time to become a climatologist?

FresqueEcoCirculaire.name: Circular Economy Collage
FresqueEcoCirculaire.description: Understand the challenges of transforming our production-consumption system

FresqueFrontieresPlanetaires.name: Planetary Boundaries Fresco
FresqueFrontieresPlanetaires.description: Discover the set of processes compromising the habitability of our planet

HorizonsDecarbones.name: Decarbonized Horizons Workshop

2030Glorieuses.name: Glorious 2030s Workshop

FresqueRenovation.description: Understand the challenges, steps, and benefits of energy renovation

FresqueEnergie.name: Energy Fresk
FresqueEnergie.description: Address the fundamentals of the contemporary energy system in a fun and self-learning way

FresqueDesPossibles.name: Possibilities Fresk
FresqueDesPossibles.description: Identify and share concrete solutions to participate in the transition on your territory

FresqueCommunication.name: Communication Fresk
FresqueCommunication.description: Address the best practices of responsible communication

NotreTour.name: Notre Tour
NotreTour.description: Take ecological issues into your own hands

PlanetC.name: Planet C Play Again

FresqueDuSol.name: The Soil Collage
FresqueDuSol.description: Understand the complexity of soil impacts to better protect it

talkAboutIt.title: Let's Talk About It (May 2025)
talkAboutIt.campaign: In May 2025, let's facilitate around the globe! We are pleased to host (here on findafresk.org) the global campaign Let's Talk About It.
talkAboutIt.throughoutMay: Throughout May 2025, let's unite under the 'Let's Talk About It!' campaign by organizing as many workshops as possible across the globe.
talkAboutIt.aimOfOperation: The aim of this joint operation is to put a spotlight on the international facilitators community and to help you recruit participants for your workshops through:
talkAboutIt.jointCommunication: Joint and harmonised communication between associations over a short period of time
talkAboutIt.commonMap: A common map highlighting the workshops of this campaign (soon here!) and local communities.
talkAboutIt.ticketingTools: Ticketing tools and prices adapted to your context, so as not to be an obstacle to recruiting participants
talkAboutIt.yourRole: What is your role as facilitator or community lead?
talkAboutIt.planWorkshops: It is easy: Plan one or more workshops in May 2025, all over the world!
talkAboutIt.createSessions: You must create the sessions before April 24, by going through the normal processes of the associations in charge of each workshop 🙂

hero.title: Unser Ziel ist es, die Interaktion zwischen Lokalen Gruppe und der globalen Gesellschaft zu fördern, um die Verbreitung von ansteckender Workshops zur Sensibilisierung für die Umwelt zu beschleunigen.
hero.subtitle: Willkommen bei Find a Fresk - eine Plattform von and für die Gesellschaft. Nicht gewinnorientiert.
hero.description: Wir sind eine enthusiastische globale Bewegung von wissenschaftsbasierten Workshop-Moderatoren. Wir nutzen Instrumente vie die Klima-Puzzle Workshops, um Menschen durch Bewusstsein, Systemdenken and kollektive Intelligence zu sinnvollem Handeln zu bewegen.

movement.title: Climate Fresk hat eine globale Bewegung für erfahrungsbasiertes Lernen ausgelöst.

collaboration.title: Keiner von uns kann es allein schaffen!
collaboration.description: Wir haben einen Aufruf veröffentlicht, um über die verschiedenen Arten zu sprechen, wie Menschen ihre Workshops international durchführen. Wir haben festgestellt, dass wir einige gemeinsame Probleme haben und noch mehr Ehrfahrungen austauschen können.
collaboration.button: Treten Sie unserer Taskforce bei (English only)

mapping.title: Kartierung von Gruppen auf der ganzen Welt!
mapping.description: Sind Sie Teil einer lokalen Gruppe oder NGO, die Workshops bietet? Wir sind dabei, eine Liste aller Multi-Workshop-Gruppen auf der ganzen Welt zu erstellen. Unser Ziel ist es, diese Gruppen weltweit bekannt zu machen.

taskforce.title: The Taskforce
taskforce.intro: This webpage is maintained by a group called 'Multiworkshop taskforce'. This group was created by local facilitators communities around the world and meets regularly to identify needs and develop solutions.

goal.title: Our goal
goal.text: Develop cooperation between the local multi-workshop communities and their ecosystem to accelerate the spread of environmental raising-awareness workshops at a global level.

structure.title: Here is how we are structured

ecosystem.title: Multi-workshop Ecosystem
ecosystem.point1: Gather insights, map stakeholders, and identify gaps in the multi-workshop movement through a structured taskforce with representatives from existing and upcoming local groups.
ecosystem.point2: Propose strategies for healthy governance and financial flows to help answer questions like: "Which legal structures work well?", "How to balance the needs of volunteers and professionals?".
ecosystem.point3: Enhance the visibility of the movement through branding and collaboration with initiatives like the Climate Fresk and other collages workshops.

tools.title: Global Digital Tools and Platforms
tools.point1: Identify digital pain points for players, facilitators, and associations that slow the global rollout of pedagogically innovative tools.
tools.point3: Advocate for the development of international digital tools/platforms, to better serve these stakeholders at a local and global level, favouring open source and open data.

local.title: Local Communities
local.point1: Help new local communities to structure their multi-workshop activities.
local.point2: Recommend local financing models with pro/volunteer synergies.
local.point3: Gather experience from existing groups. This knowledge will culminate in a handbook for local multi-workshop structures.
local.point4: Connect these local groups with the global community and its tools. This will be useful to avoid repeating others' mistakes.

progress.title: What have we done so far?

team.title: We built a team!
team.text1: We gathered representatives from over 30 local groups, collectives and NGOs who shared the same interest for collective intelligence workshops.

consulting.question: Are you responsible for a workshop or a local community?
consulting.understand: We put out a call to talk about the different ways people are Multi-Fresking internationally. We realised we have some shared pain points and even more lessons to share. We want to understand…
consulting.support: … in how you support your facilitator community to organise workshops.

mapping.title: Mapping groups around the World!
mapping.question: Are you part of a group delivering workshops?
mapping.compile: We are trying to compile a list of all the Multi-Workshop groups around the world to give them visibility.

globalCommunity.heading: A global multi-workshop community
globalCommunity.paragraph: Our global multi-workshop community often originated from the rollout of the Climate Fresk association. Other NGOs have now created many other workshops and tools, based on the same collective intelligence principles, always rooted in published science. After having played a workshop, individuals get trained as facilitators and are empowered to join the community and to start spreading awareness around them.

builtByLocal.heading: A community built by local groups
builtByLocal.paragraph1: Local communitites are now structuring their activities to best deploy these multiple tools in specific regions. We've listed more than 40 of them groups that spread our favorite workshops. All over the world!
builtByLocal.paragraph2: A dot on this map does not represent the diversity of culture, purpose and maturity of these groups. But who knows, maybe it helps you getting in touch with them?

missing.paragraph: If your local group is missing, please click the button to fill-in the form.
missing.button: Add a local group to the map

unique.paragraph: Every local community is unique! In the next steps, we aim to make nuances more visible: which of these groups are focused on empowering communities?
